Alligator/Crocodile.name: 鳄鱼/短吻鳄
Alligator/Crocodile.biography:
鳄鱼与短吻鳄是大多数沼地类冒险的常客，以下数据代表了这两种常见的鳄鱼样例。在一些偏远的地区时而会有体型更大的种类。

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (水栖)]{水栖}: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速} 5.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 1: 通常鳄鱼有12英尺长，皮糙肉厚，重量差不多在500磅左右。

items.name: 护甲 +2
items.description: Thick skin.

items.name: 噬咬
items.description:
见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}。

Rollover: Gators and crocs grasp prey in their vice-like jaws and roll with them. If one of these large reptiles hits with a raise, its bonus damage is a d10 instead of a d6.

Bear.name: 熊
Bear.biography:
这个条目涵盖了较大的熊类，如灰熊、科迪亚克岛棕熊和北极熊。这些熊的偏好战法是抓住猎物，并以锐利的尖牙进行撕咬。

特殊能力:
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 2: 这些生物站起来高度可达8英尺，重量超过1000磅。

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

Bull.name: 公牛
Bull.biography:
公牛只有在被激怒时才会对人类有攻击性，当然，如果你已经需要在这里查数据，那就说明很可能它已经火冒三丈了。

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 3: 大多数公牛体重差不多有整整1吨。

items.name: 角撞
items.description: 未提供描述或引用。

Cat, Small.name: 猫，小型
Cat, Small.biography:
This is an ordinary house cat, the sort that might be a familiar for a spellcaster, a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-edges.野兽大师]{野兽大师}’s animal friend, or an alternate form for the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.化形]{化形} power.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (微光视觉)]{微光视觉}: Cats ignore penalties for Dim and Dark @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.照明]{照明}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} −3 (Very Small): Cats are typically less than a foot high.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

Dire Wolf.name: 凶暴狼
Dire Wolf.biography:
Dire wolves are very large and feral canines often used by orcs as attack dogs. They may also be found roaming in packs in the deepest, darkest woods.

特殊能力:

  • Speed: d10 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{奔跑骰}.

items.name: 噬咬
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}。

Dog / Wolf.name: 狗/狼
Dog / Wolf.biography:
The stats below are for large attack dogs, such as Rottweilers and Doberman Pinschers, as well as wolves, hyenas, and the like.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} −1: The heads of these canines come to an average human’s waist, and they weigh about 60 pounds.
  • Speed: d10 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{奔跑骰}.

items.name: 噬咬
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}。

Dragon.name: 龙
Dragon.biography:
Dragons are fire-breathing monsters that bring doom and despair to the villages they ravage. Such creatures should not be fought lightly as they are more than a match for even a party of experienced adventurers. These beasts are quite intelligent as well, and use all of their advantages when confronted by would-be dragon-slayers.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (恐惧)]{恐惧} (−2): Anyone who sees a mighty dragon must make a Fear check at −2.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (飞行)]{飞行}: Dragons have a Flying Pace of 24″.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (顽强)]{顽强}: The creature does not suffer a Wound from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇} twice.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 8 (Huge): Dragons are massive crea­tures, over 40′ long from nose to tail and weighing over 30,000 pounds.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (猛击)]{猛击}: Dragons ignore up to 4 points of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.体型与尺寸]{尺寸} penalties when attacking with their claws.

items.name: 护甲 +4
items.description: Scaly hide.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

items.name: Tail Lash
items.description: The creature may make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.自由攻击]{自由攻击} against up to two foes to its side or rear at no penalty.

items.name: Fiery Breath
items.description: Dragons breathe fire for 3d6 damage.

Drake.name: 龙兽
Drake.biography:
Drakes are non-flying dragons with animal intelligence (rather than the more human-like sentience of true dragons). They are much more aggressive in direct combat than their distant cousins, however.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (恐惧)]{恐惧}: Drakes are frightening creatures to behold.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (强韧/非常强韧)]{强韧}: Drakes can take one Wound before they’re Incapacitated.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 6 (Large): Drakes are over 20′ long from snout to tail.

items.name: 护甲 +4
items.description: Scaly hide.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

items.name: Tail Lash
items.description: The creature may make a free attack against up to two foes to its side or rear at no penalty.

items.name: Fiery Breath
items.description: Drakes breathe fire for 3d6 damage.

Elemental, Air.name: 气元素
Elemental, Air.biography:
Air elementals manifest as sentient whirlwinds.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (元素)]{元素}: No additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}, ignores 1 point of Wound penalties, doesn’t breathe, immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • Gaseous Form: Can maneuver through any non-solid surface, pass through cracks in doors or windows, bubble through water, etc.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (飞行)]{飞行}: Air elementals fly at Pace 12″.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无敌)]{无敌}: Immune to non-magical attacks.

items.name: Wind Blast
items.description: Air elementals can send directed blasts of air to knock their foes away. They may choose one target or a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{锥形盖板}, and use their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} skill for the roll. Those affected make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{力量} roll (at −2 if the elemental gets a raise) or are hurled 2d6″. Anyone who strikes a hard object (such as a wall) takes 2d4 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.非致命伤害]{非致命伤害}.

Elemental, Earth.name: 土元素
Elemental, Earth.biography:
Earth elementals manifest as five-foot-tall, vaguely man-shaped collections of earth and stone. Though strong, they are also quite slow and ponderous.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (遁地)]{遁地} (10″): Earth elementals can meld into and out of the ground.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (元素)]{元素}: No additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}, ignores 1 point of Wound penalties, doesn’t breathe, immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (免疫)]{免疫}: Immune to earth-based attacks (including thrown stones or powers with earth, mud, stone, or sand Trappings).
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (强韧/非常强韧)]{强韧}: Earth elementals can take one Wound before they’re Incapacitated.

items.name: 护甲 +4
items.description: Rocky hide.

Elemental, Fire.name: 火元素
Elemental, Fire.biography:
Fire elementals appear as man-shaped flame.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (元素)]{元素}: No additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}, ignores 1 point of Wound penalties, doesn’t breathe, immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (免疫)]{免疫}: Fire elementals are immune to fire and heat-based attacks.

items.name: Fiery Touch
items.description: Chance of catching @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.火焰]{火焰}.

items.name: Flame Strike
items.description: Can project a searing blast of flame using the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{锥形盖板} and their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} skill. Characters within take 3d6 and may catch @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.火焰]{火焰}. May be Evaded.

Elemental, Water.name: 水元素
Elemental, Water.biography:
These spirits are frothing, man-shaped beings of water.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (水栖)]{水栖}: Pace 12″.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (元素)]{元素}: No additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}, ignores 1 point of Wound penalties, doesn’t breathe, immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (免疫)]{免疫}: Immune to water-based attacks.
  • Seep: Can squeeze through any porous gap as if it were @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{困难地形}.

items.name: Slam
items.description: Deals @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.非致命伤害]{非致命伤害}

items.name: Waterspout
items.description: Can project a torrent of water using the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{锥形盖板} and their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} skill. Those within take 2d6 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.非致命伤害]{非致命伤害}. This may be @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.回避]{回避}.

Ghost.name: 鬼魂
Ghost.biography:
Specters, shades, and phantoms sometimes return from death to haunt the living or fulfill some unfinished business.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (灵态)]{灵态}: Ghosts can become invisible and immaterial at will and can only be harmed by magical attacks.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (恐惧)]{恐惧} (−2): Ghosts cause Fear checks at −2 when they let themselves be seen.

items.name: Thrown objects
items.description: 未提供描述或引用。

Giant Worm.name: 巨蠕虫
Giant Worm.biography:
Massive worms tunneling beneath the earth to gobble up unsuspecting adventurers are sometimes found in lonesome flatlands. The things sense vibrations through the earth, hearing a walking person at about 200 yards. The stats below are for a monster some 50 feet long.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (遁地)]{遁地} (20″): Giant worms tunnel through the ground, blocked only by solid bedrock.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (顽强)]{顽强}: The creature does not suffer a Wound from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇} twice.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 9 (Huge): Giant worms are usually over 50′ long and 10′ or more in diameter.

items.name: 护甲 +4
items.description: Scaly hide.

items.name: 噬咬
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}。

items.name: Slam
items.description: Giant worms crush prey beneath their massive bodies. Lay three @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{小型爆散盖板} adjacent to one another and in a straight line to represent the portion of the creature’s body used to crush. Everything within must beat the worm in an opposed @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.运动]{运动} versus @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{灵巧} roll or take its Str as damage. Ignore @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.体型与尺寸]{尺寸} modifiers when making a slam attack.

Goblin.name: 哥布林
Goblin.biography:
Goblins of myth and legend are far more sin­is­ter creatures than some games and fiction portray. In the original tales, they were terrifying creatures that stole into homes in the middle of the night to steal and eat unruly children. The statistics here work for both dark “fairy tale” goblins as well as those found alongside orcs in contemporary roleplaying games.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (红外感应)]{红外感应} Halve penalties for Illumination when attacking warm targets.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} −1: Goblins stand 3–4′ tall.

Horse.name: 马
Horse.biography:
Riding horses compromise speed with carrying capacity.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 2: Typical quarter horse of about 1,000 lbs.

items.name: Kick
items.description: To the front or rear as desired.

Horse, War.name: 战马
Horse, War.biography:
War horses are large beasts trained for aggression. They are trained to fight with both hooves, either to their front or their rear.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 3: Warhorses are large creatures bred for their power and stature.

items.name: Kick
items.description: To the front or rear as desired.

Lich.name: 巫妖
Lich.biography:
Perhaps the most diabolical creature in any fantasy land is the lich—a necromancer so consumed with the black arts that he eventually becomes undead himself.

特殊能力:

  • Spells: Liches have 50 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.奥法背景]{奇术点} and know most every spell available.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (不死族)]{不死族}: +2 Toughness; +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; no additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}; ignores 1 point of Wound penalties; doesn’t breathe; immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • Zombie: Liches are necromancers first and foremost. The undead they raise through the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.行尸]{行尸} spell are permanent, and they may raise @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.骷髅]{骷髅} just like @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.行尸]{丧尸} as they choose. Some liches have built up entire armies of the undead at their disposal.

items.name: Other magical items
items.description: 未提供描述或引用。

items.name: Magical Armor (+6)
Death Touch
items.description: Liches drain the lives of those around them with a touch. Instead of a normal attack, a lich may make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.接触攻击]{接触攻击}. Every raise on its @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.格斗]{格斗} roll automatically inflicts one Wound to its target.

Lion.name: 狮子
Lion.biography:
The kings of the jungle are fierce predators, particularly in open grassland where their prey cannot seek refuge.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (微光视觉)]{微光视觉}: Lions ignore penalties for Dim and Dark @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.照明]{照明}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 1: Typical males are about 400 pounds.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Special Ability (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

items.name: Pounce (Wild Attack)
items.description: Lions pounce on their prey to best bring their mass and claws to bear. If a lion makes a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.不羁攻击]{不羁攻击}, it adds +4 to its damage instead of +2.

Mech.name: 机兵
Mech.biography:
These stats are for a 12-foot-tall mechanized sentinel, as found in a hard scifi campaign. This is a light patrol-style platform with reasonable intelligence, a sensor package, and high maneuverability. Larger mechs outfitted for battle have substantially more armor, are larger, and have more specialized weaponry.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (构装体)]{构装体}: +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; ignores 1 point of Wound penalties; does not breathe or suffer from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病} or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无畏)]{无畏}: Mechs are immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.恐惧]{恐惧}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.威吓]{威吓}, but may be smart enough to react to fear-causing situations aptly.
  • Night Vision: Sensor packages ignore penalties for @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.照明]{照明}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 4 (Large): The mech stands 15′ tall.

items.name: Alertness (Sensors).
items.description: 未提供描述或引用。

Minotaur.name: 牛头人
Minotaur.biography:
Minotaurs stand over seven feet tall and have massive, bull-like heads and horns. In many fantasy worlds, they are used as guardians of labyrinths. In others, they are simply another race of creatures occupying a fantastically savage land. In all cases, they are fierce beasts eager for battle and the taste of their opponents’ flesh.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (强韧/非常强韧)]{强韧}: Minotaurs can take one Wound before they’re @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{无力化}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 3: Minotaurs stand over 7′ tall and have the mass of bulls.

items.name: 角撞
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (角撞)]{角撞}.

items.name: Spear
items.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.触及]{触及} 1. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.格挡]{格挡} +1 if used @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.双手]{two-handed}

items.name: Leather Armor
items.description: Heavy winter clothing, supple leather armor, soft hides.

Mule.name: 骡
Mule.biography:
Mules are a cross between a donkey and a horse, and are usually used to haul heavy goods or pull wagons.

Like any good pet, the GM should give the mule a little personality. The expression “stubborn as a mule” certainly comes to mind.

特殊能力:

  • Ornery: Mules are contrary creatures. Characters must subtract 1 from their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.骑乘]{骑乘} rolls when riding them.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 2: Mules are stocky creatures usually weighing under 1000 pounds.

Ogre.name: 食人魔
Ogre.biography:
Ogres are kin to orcs and lesser giants. They are often taken in by orc clans, who respect the dumb brutes for their savagery and strength. Orcs often pit their “pet” ogres in savage combats against their rivals’.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (强韧/非常强韧)]{强韧}: Ogres can take one Wound before they’re @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{无力化}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 2: Most ogres are over 8′ tall with pot-bellies and massive arms and legs.

Orc.name: 兽人
Orc.biography:
Orcs are savage, green-skinned humanoids with pig-like features, including snouts and sometimes even tusks. They have foul temperaments and rarely take prisoners.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (红外感应)]{红外感应}: Halve penalties for @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.照明]{照明} when attacking warm targets.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 1: Orcs are slightly larger than humans.

Orc, Chieftain.name: 兽人酋长
Orc, Chieftain.biography:
The leader of a small orc clan is always the most deadly brute in the bunch. Orc chieftains generally have a magical item or two in settings where such things are relatively common (most “swords & sorcery” worlds).

Note:

Orc chieftains have a 7 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.角色]{格挡} when wielding a Great Axe.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (红外感应)]{红外感应}: Halve penalties for @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.照明]{照明} when attacking warm targets.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 1: Orcs are slightly larger than humans.

items.name: Plate Corselet
items.description: Heavy steel armor made with “plates” of metal.

items.name: Chain Arms and Legs
items.description: Chain, splint, metal scale, ring mail, samurai armor.

Raptor (Birds of Prey).name: 猛禽 (肉食鸟类)
Raptor (Birds of Prey).biography:
Eagles, hawks, and similar large birds of prey are collectively termed “raptors” (not to be confused with the dinosaur variety).

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (飞行)]{飞行}: Raptors ﬂy at a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速} of 48″.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} −3 (Very Small): Raptors are light-weight and about two feet tall.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

Shark.name: 鲨鱼
Shark.biography:
These statistics cover bull sharks and white tips.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (水栖)]{水栖}: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速} 10.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 1: Sharks up to 500 pounds.

items.name: 噬咬
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}。

Shark, Bull.name: 牛鲨
Shark, Bull.biography:
These statistics cover bull sharks and white tips.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (水栖)]{水栖}: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速} 10.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 1: Sharks up to 500 pounds.

items.name: 噬咬
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}。

Shark, Great White.name: 大白鲨
Shark, Great White.biography:
These statistics cover great whites, 18 to 25 feet long.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (水栖)]{水栖}: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速}.10
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (顽强)]{顽强}: The creature does not suﬀer a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤} from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇} twice.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 4 (Large): Great whites can grow up to 25′ in length.

items.name: 噬咬
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}。

Skeleton.name: 骷髅
Skeleton.biography:
The skin has already rotted from these risen dead, leaving them slightly quicker than their ﬂesh-laden zombie counterparts. They are often found swarming in vile necromancers’ legions.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无畏)]{无畏}: Skeletons are immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.恐惧]{恐惧}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.威吓]{威吓}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (不死族)]{不死族}: +2 Toughness; +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; no additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}; ignores 1 point of Wound penalties; doesn’t breathe; immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.

items.name: Claws
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

items.name: Varies
items.description: 未提供描述或引用。

Snake, Constrictor.name: 蟒蛇
Snake, Constrictor.biography:
Snakes in the real world are rarely aggressive unless cornered or frightened. They’re a staple of adventure ﬁction, however.

Pythons, boa constrictors, and other snakes over 15′ long are rarely deadly to man in the real world because they aren’t particularly aggressive. In games, however, such snakes might be provoked, drugged, or just plain mean.

特殊能力:

  • Constrict: +2 to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{运动}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{力量} rolls made to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.擒抱]{擒抱}.

items.name: 噬咬
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}。

Snake, Venomous.name: 毒蛇
Snake, Venomous.biography:
Snakes in the real world are rarely aggressive unless cornered or frightened. They’re a staple of adventure ﬁction, however.

Here are the stats for Taipans (Australian brown snakes), cobras, and similar medium-sized snakes with extremely deadly poison.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (毒素)]{毒素}: The GM chooses what kind of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素} the viper injects.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.体型与尺寸]{体型} −3 (Very Small): Most venomous snakes are 4–6′ in length, but only a few inches thick.

items.name: 噬咬
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}。

Soldier.name: 士兵
Soldier.biography: Goons, grunts, soldiers, or others with basic training serve as foot soldiers for more powerful characters. They should be customized and outﬁted to ﬁt their particular role.

Soldier, Experienced.name: 老兵
Soldier, Experienced.biography: Goons, grunts, soldiers, or others with basic training serve as foot soldiers for more powerful characters. They should be customized and outﬁted to ﬁt their particular role.

Spider, Giant.name: 巨蜘蛛
Spider, Giant.biography:
Giant spiders are about the size of large dogs and live in nests of 1d6+2 arachnids. They frequently go hunting in packs when prey is scarce in their home lair.

Their dens are litered with the bones and treasures of their victims, often providing ripe pickings for those brave enough to venture within.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (毒素)]{毒素} (−4): Usually @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{温和} or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{致命}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} −1:These spiders are dog-sized.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (走壁)]{走壁}:The creatures move at their full @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.移动]{移速} on walls and ceilings! Creepy!

items.name: 噬咬
items.description: 未提供描述或引用。

items.name: Webbing
items.description: The spiders can cast webs from their thorax that are the size of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{小型爆散盖板}. This is a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.射击]{射击} roll with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.射程]{射程} of 6″. A hit means the victim is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.束缚与纠缠]{纠缠}, or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.束缚与纠缠]{束缚} with a raise.

Summon Ally: Attendant.name: 召唤盟友: 扈从
Summon Ally: Attendant.biography:
特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (构装体)]{构装体}: +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; ignore 1 point of Wound penalties; doesn't breathe, immune @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病} or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无畏)]{无畏}: Immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.恐惧]{恐惧}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.威吓]{威吓}.

Summon Ally: Bodyguard.name: 召唤盟友: 保镖
Summon Ally: Bodyguard.biography:
特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (构装体)]{构装体}: +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; ignore 1 point of Wound penalties; doesn't breathe, immune @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病} or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无畏)]{无畏}: Immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.恐惧]{恐惧}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.威吓]{威吓}.

items.name: 护甲 +2
items.description: Hardened skin.

Summon Ally: Sentinel.name: 召唤盟友: 禁卫
Summon Ally: Sentinel.biography:
特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (构装体)]{构装体}: +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; ignore 1 point of Wound penalties; doesn't breathe, immune @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病} or @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无畏)]{无畏}: Immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.恐惧]{恐惧}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.威吓]{威吓}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 2: Sentinels are 8' tall and very dense.

items.name: 护甲 +4
items.description: Stone skin.

Swarm.name: 集群
Swarm.biography:
Sometimes the most deadly foes come in the smallest packages. The swarm described here can be of most anything—from biting ants to stinging wasps to ﬁlthy rats. They cover an area equal to a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{大型，中型或小型爆散盖板} and attack everyone within it every round (unless @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}). When a swarm is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{无力化} it’s eﬀectively dispersed.

Swarms aren’t intelligent enough to do anything but move and bite and shouldn’t take @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.多重动作]{多重动作}, make @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.考验]{考验}, etc.

特殊能力:

  • Split: Some swarms split into two smaller swarms when @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤} (GM’s call). Reduce the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{爆散盖板} one size after a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤}; Small swarms are destroyed.
  • Swarm: +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.角色]{格挡} +2. Swarms are composed of many small creatures, so cutting and piercing weapons do no real damage. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.范围效果攻击]{范围效果攻击} work normally, and a character can stomp to inﬂict his damage in @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{力量} each round. Some swarms (bees, hornets, birds) may be foiled by total immersion in water.

items.name: Bite or Sting
items.description: Swarms inﬂict hundreds of tiny bites or stings every round, hitting automatically (unless @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}) and causing 2d4 damage to everyone in the template at the end of their turn. Damage is applied to the least armored location (those in completely sealed suits are immune).
items.notes: Small, Medium or Large Blast Template

Troll.name: 巨魔
Troll.biography:
Trolls in myths and legends are horrid, ﬂesh-eating creatures who live in deep woods, beneath bridges, or in hidden mountain caves.

In modern games and ﬁction, trolls are monsters with the ability to regenerate damage other than that caused by ﬁre. These statistics reﬂect both backgrounds.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (再生)]{快速再生}: Trolls may attempt a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.恢复]{自然恢复} roll every round, even if @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{无力化} unless their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤} were caused by ﬁre or ﬂame or they’re put to the torch afterward.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (强韧/非常强韧)]{强韧}: Trolls can take one @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤} before they’re @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{无力化}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 1: Trolls are 8’ tall, lanky creatures.

items.name: 护甲 +1
items.description: Rubbery hide.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

items.name: Spiked Club
items.description: Similar to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-equipment.重棒]{重棒} but bigger and spikier.

Vampire.name: 吸血鬼
Vampire.biography:
Blood-drinkers of lore are common in many fantasy games. This is a relatively young vampire minion. For weaker vampires, ignore the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无敌)]{无敌} Special Ability.

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无敌)]{无敌}: Vampires can only be slain by sunlight or a stake through the heart (see those Weaknesses, below). They may be @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇} by other attacks, but never @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤}.
  • Sire: Anyone slain by a vampire has a 50% chance of rising as a vampire in [[/r 1d4]] days.
  • Undead: +2 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.角色]{坚韧}; +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; no additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}; ignores 1 point of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤} penalties; doesn’t breathe; immune to disease and poison.
  • Weakness (Holy Symbol): A character with a holy symbol may keep a vampire at bay by displaying a holy symbol. A vampire who wants to directly attack the victim must beat her in an opposed Spirit roll.
  • Weakness (Holy Water): A vampire sprinkled with holy water is Fatigued. If immersed, he combusts as if it were direct sunlight (see below).
  • Weakness (Invitation Only): Vampires cannot enter a private dwelling without being invited. They may enter public domains as they please.
  • Weakness (Stake Through the Heart): A vampire hit with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击} to the heart (−4) must make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{活力} roll versus the damage. If successful, it takes damage normally. If it fails, it disintegrates to dust.
  • Weakness (Sunlight): Vampires burn in sunlight. They take [[/r 2d4]] damage per round until they are ash. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.护甲]{护甲} protects normally.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

Vampire, Ancient.name: 上古吸血鬼
Vampire, Ancient.biography:
These statistics are for a vampire somewhat below the legendary Dracula, but far above those bloodsuckers fresh from the grave. The abilities listed here are standard—the GM may want to add other @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.专长]{专长} as befit the vampire’s previous lifestyle.

特殊能力:

  • Change Form: As an action, a vampire can change into a wolf or bat with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} roll at −2. Changing back into humanoid form requires a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} roll.
  • Charm: Vampires can use the @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.傀儡]{傀儡} power on those attracted to them (GM’s call) using their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} as their @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.奥法背景]{奥法技能}. They can cast and maintain the power indefinitely, but may only affect one target at a time.
  • Children of the Night: Ancient vampires have the ability to summon and control wolves or rats. This requires an action and a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} roll at −2. If successful, [[/sr 1d6 # Wolves summoned]] wolves or [[/sr 1d6 # Swarms of rats summoned]] swarms of rats (见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-bestiary.集群]{集群}) come from the surrounding wilds in [[/sr 1d6+2 # Rounds until summoned]] rounds.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无敌)]{无敌}: Vampires can only be slain by sunlight or a stake through the heart (see those Weaknesses, below). They may be @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇} by other attacks, but never @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤}.
  • Mist: Ancient vampires have the ability to turn into mist. Doing so (or returning to human form) requires an action and a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{聪慧} roll at −2.
  • Sire: Anyone slain by a vampire has a 50% chance of rising as a vampire in [[/r 1d4]] days.
  • Undead: +2 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.角色]{坚韧}; +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; no additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}; ignores 1 point of @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{损伤} penalties; doesn’t breathe; immune to disease and poison.
  • Weakness (Holy Symbol): A character with a holy symbol may keep a vampire at bay by displaying a holy symbol. A vampire who wants to directly attack the victim must beat her in an opposed Spirit roll.
  • Weakness (Holy Water): A vampire sprinkled with holy water is Fatigued. If immersed, he combusts as if it were direct sunlight (see below).
  • Weakness (Invitation Only): Vampires cannot enter a private dwelling without being invited. They may enter public domains as they please.
  • Weakness (Stake Through the Heart): A vampire hit with a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击} to the heart (−4) must make a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特性]{活力} roll versus the damage. If successful, it takes damage normally. If it fails, it disintegrates to dust.
  • Weakness (Sunlight): Vampires burn in sunlight. They take [[/r 2d4]] damage per round until they are ash. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-powers.护甲]{护甲} protects normally.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

Werewolf.name: 狼人
Werewolf.biography:
When a full moon emerges, humans infected with lycan­thropy lose control and become snarling creatures bent on murder. Some embrace their cursed state and revel in the destruction they cause.

Customize the 特殊能力 that make sense for your particular flesh-ripper. Older or “pure-blood” lycanthropes may be Invulnerable to all but silver or magic, for example.

特殊能力:

  • Fast Regeneration: Werewolves may attempt a @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.恢复]{自然恢复} roll every round unless the Wounds were caused by silvered objects.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (恐惧)]{恐惧} (−2): Were­wolves chill the blood of all who see them.
  • Infection: Anyone slain by a were­wolf has a 50% chance of rising as a werewolf themselves. The character involuntarily transforms every full moon. He gains control of his lycanthropy only after [[/sr 1d6 # Years after which the character gains control of lycanthropy]] years as a werewolf.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (红外感应)]{红外感应}: Halve penalties for @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.照明]{照明} when attacking warm targets.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (体型)]{体型} 1: Werewolves are stout creatures.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。

Zombie.name: 行尸
Zombie.biography:
These walking dead are typical groaning fiends looking for fresh meat. 

特殊能力:

  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (无畏)]{无畏}: Immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.恐惧]{恐惧}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-skills.威吓]{威吓}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (不死族)]{不死族}: +2 Toughness; +2 to recover from being @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.伤害效果]{动摇}; no additional damage from @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击}; ignores 1 point of Wound penalties; doesn’t breathe; immune to @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.疾病]{疾病}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.毒素]{毒素}.
  • @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (弱点)]{弱点} (Head): @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.定点攻击]{定点攻击} to a zombie’s head do the usual +4 damage.

items.name: 噬咬/爪抓
items.description: 见@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (噬咬)]{噬咬}和@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.特殊能力 (爪抓)]{爪抓}。
